page.title: 09HOME LIFE, CHELWOOD GATE
page.content: Most epople live in small houses, bun- galows, semi-detached houses or cot- tages surrounded by their own gardens, apart from two larger country houses with staff. Most houses are on main water and drainage, some on cesspits. All have electricity; are heated by oil central heating, solid fuel or night storage or calor gas heaters. Cooking is done by electricity or calor gas. Most houses have refrige- rators & washing machines and some have deep freezes. Most people have video recorders and home computers. Dogs, cats and horses are popular pets, also rabbits, guinea pigs and other small animals. Most children go to day school and so live at home.
